1. root
  2. subsystem=infinispan
  3. cache-container
  4. cache
  5. component=locking

Management API Reference for component=locking

The locking configuration of the cache.

Attributes (3)

  • current-concurrency-level - The estimated number of concurrently updating threads which this cache can support.
    Deprecated Since 17.0.0
    Deprecated. Returns the concurrency-level with which the cache was configured.
    Type INT
    Where is the attribute stored? runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability Level default
    Raw DMR model 
    
{
    "type" : {
        "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "INT"
    },
    "description" : "The estimated number of concurrently updating threads which this cache can support.",
    "expressions-allowed" : false,
    "required" : true,
    "nillable" : false,
    "stability" : "default",
    "deprecated" : {
        "since" : "17.0.0",
        "reason" : "Deprecated. Returns the concurrency-level with which the cache was configured."
    },
    "access-type" : "metric",
    "storage" : "runtime",
    "restart-required" : null,
    "capability-reference" : null
}
  • number-of-locks-available - The number of locks available to this cache.
    Type INT
    Where is the attribute stored? runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability Level default

    Where is the attribute stored? runtime
